metadata.name: KALI
metadata.description:
GODDESS KALI is the ultimate manifestation 
of Shakti (energy) . The female power and the mother of all living beings. 
Destroyer of evil, Kali is also seen as the divine protector and the one 
who bestows moksha (liberation).

A Behrupia (impersonator) in a dazzling depiction of Goddess Kali.

Rights Usage terms: Extended Editorial  
Private Display / Personal Non-Commercial Use. The Rights Usage includes unlimited use to display in IRL physical or VIRTUAL galleries, by the NFT holder. No rights for commercial use, distribution, or derivative works allowed.
